name: TV Time!
description:
Greetings, video game player! Today we got a great fun time for play with your pals, called TV Time! Be the first to tune all the TVs; have the most TVs tuned to win and be the cat's pajamas!

A Global Game Jam 2018 game by these guys:

Michael Arcadi: code
Justin Capcap: code
James Pratt: code, audio
Jennifer Stienstra: code, video editing
Yani Wang: art
Keana Almario: art
with music by Patrick Flattery
